attributes.action: allow the law abiding, tax paying people the right to privately own Firearms and Ammunition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To propose a 6 Month waiting list to obtain a Firearm, and regular psychiatric assessment during this cooling off period. 

Regular 6 month mandatory psychiatric assessments during ownership as well as mandatory "safe gun handling" tests.

To Propose seperate gun components be stored safely and so unable to assemble and use owned weapon at a single location.

- Gun Carcasses to be stored in a Steel Gun cabinet. 
- Rifle Bolts and all other firing mechanisms to be kept in a seperate steel enclosed Location.
- Ammunition and Magazines to be stored in another steel enclosed Location.
